MAGNOLIA, Miss. Circuit
Judge William Watkins set the
trials for 10 Negroes charged
under a new state law in con-
nection with racial rioting at
nearby McComb last month
following the bombing of a Negro

Richie Allen. Philadelphia
rookie baseball player, was
named Rookie of the Year. His
name was chosen by l3 of 20
National League sport swriters.


Born in Wampum, Pa. Richie

home.


The Negroes were among SO
persons indicted this week by
the Pike County Grand Jury which
also was instructed to consider
evidence against ii white men
accused in recent racial bomb
ingS.

Allen received bonus of more
than $4,000 when he was signed
by a baseball team in 1860.
He played three years in the
minor leagues before joining the
Phillies this sea son.

the National School Lunch Pro-
gram. Throughout the year they
consume almost 8 billion lunches.
